entity.description: US Secretary of State, Mike Pompeo

text: Good talk today with Brazilian Foreign Minister @ernestofaraujo. The U.S.-#Brazil partnership is stronger than ever, and we must continue advancing the Democratic Transition Framework for #Venezuela. Together we will combat #COVID19 in the hemisphere.
